insert_channel {"id": 1, "user_id": 1, "name": "foobar", "prefix": "+", "bot_name": "hortbot", "active": true}

handle hortbot @id=__UUID__;room-id=1;display-name=FooBar :foobar!foobar@foobar.tmi.twitch.tv PRIVMSG #foobar :+testing_name
send hortbot #foobar [HB] foobar

handle hortbot @id=__UUID__;room-id=1;display-name=FooBar :foobar!foobar@foobar.tmi.twitch.tv PRIVMSG #foobar :+testing_display_name
send hortbot #foobar [HB] FooBar
